name: hyperapp
description: HyperApp is a 1kb functional JavaScript library for building modern UI applications
author: Jorge Bucaran

scripts.build:app: browserify app.js -s app -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] | uglifyjs > dist/app.min.js
scripts.build:html: browserify html.js -s html -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] | uglifyjs > dist/html.min.js
scripts.build:h: browserify h.js -s h -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] | uglifyjs > dist/h.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:app && npm run build:html && npm run build:h
